name: What's So Gay About Robin Hood?
name_original: What's So Gay About Robin Hood?
description:
Even among the outlaws, not many knew of you and your beloved, but then while Sherwood’s famous outlaws were on some important quest, your love was taken, and there was only you to save them.

If not rescued, your beloved will be hanged at Nottingham Fair. Will you find them? Will they see you again? Will you escape, even for just a time? Will someone you trust betray you? 

This game was inspired by Jared's What's So Cool About Outer Space?  for What's So Cool About Jam.
